bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2013 to provide funding for the increased costs associated with the Board of Regents employee health insurance and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2013 to provide funding for the increased costs associated with the Board of Regents employee health insurance and to declare an emergency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (1) Regents Central Office Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$3,624,219" and insert "$3,691,383" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$1,865,139" and insert "$1,901,459" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (4) University of South Dakota Proper Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$27,446,842" and insert "$28,897,673" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$8,732,373" and insert "$8,871,162" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$38,474,379" and insert "$39,501,838" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (5) University of South Dakota School of Medicine Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$16,270,308" and insert "$16,540,570" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$8,499,070" and insert "$8,582,699" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$9,949,992" and insert "$10,142,717" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 4. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (6) South Dakota State University Proper Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$34,759,862" and insert "$36,803,610" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$15,720,299" and insert "$15,902,820" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$72,415,889" and insert "$72,648,470" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 5. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (7) Cooperative Extension Service Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$7,289,150" and insert "$7,409,947" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$5,235,302" and insert "$5,291,664" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$799,944" and insert "$812,971" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 6. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (8) Agricultural Experiment Station Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$9,566,991" and insert "$9,695,998" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$8,053,808" and insert "$8,106,958" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$5,099,905" and insert "$5,180,961" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 7. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (9) South Dakota School of Mines and Technology Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$12,856,404" and insert "$13,324.773" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$20,508,231" and insert "$20,531,686" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$16,057,032" and insert "$16,110,908" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 8. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (10) Northern State University Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$10,464,840" and insert "$10,948,562" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$1,243,739" and insert "$1,261,155" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$11,956,352" and insert "$11,999,468" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 9. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (11) Black Hills State University Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$6,656,695" and insert "$7,188,892" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$3,901,197" and insert "$3,931,507" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$19,670,093" and insert "$19,739,051" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 10. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (12) Dakota State University Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$7,602,586" and insert "$7,999,861" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$2,446,990" and insert "$2,467,809" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$10,705,373" and insert "$10,730,597" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 11. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (13) South Dakota School for the Deaf Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$1,399,214" and insert "$1,434,744" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 12. That section 14 of chapter 30 of the 2012 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS (14) South Dakota School for the Blind and Visually Impaired Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$2,362,926" and insert "$2,442,654" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$276,069" and insert "$276,687" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 13. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.
